name: Forex Playbook
tag_list: forex, stocks, options, futures, trading, managed-accounts
overview:
Forex Playbook offers independent analysis and investment management services covering the global markets – including stocks, options, forex and futures.

Visitors to Forex Playbook’s website (http://forexplaybook.com) will enjoy unlimited access to investment research, empowering independent investors with the information needed to trade the global markets. Members can register to the site free of charge for daily recommendations on currency trades.

For both novice and expert traders alike, Forex Playbook is the perfect complement to your daily investing and financial needs.
